Snap Freeze deals 5 cold damage to enemies in the area of effect. This damage counts as a hit and enables snap freeze to apply other on hit effects.

Freeze enemies in a cone in front of you. Freeze lasts for 2 seconds.

nodeList.description: Improves Snap Freeze’s base critical strike chance.

node.altText: Shock reduces lightning resistance by 5%, increases chance to be stunned by 10%, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack up to 20 times. It has 60% reduced effect against bosses and players.
node.description:
Snap Freeze no longer freezes and its base cold damage is converted to lightning damage. Consequently this damage scales with increases to lightning damage, but not increases to cold damage.

Adds 4 lighting damage for each second of freeze duration. 

All chill chance is converted to shock chance, and all nodes which rely on targets being frozen or chilled now work on shocked enemies instead.
node.nodeDescription: All cold damage is converted into lightning damage. Adds 4 lighting damage for each second of freeze duration. All chill chance is converted to shock chance and all nodes which rely on targets being frozen or chilled now work on shocked enemies instead.
